attributes.action: enact legislation to introduce a 3 strikes and out criminal policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every day we read about criminals who have strings of convictions. It is not unusual to hear of criminals who have 10, 20 and even 30+ previous convictions, however these people are still left to walk the streets continuing thier criminal activities.

We need to be protected from these people and it is the governments duty to enact legislation to prevent to constant abuses these criminals inflict upon the public.

Any criminal who has previously received 2 custodial sentences should be liable for a minimum term of 25 years upon a 3rd conviction before even being considered for parole.

We can no longer afford to keep being soft on crime and have to make sure there is a real deterant for these people.
